testcase.name: Cyclic Dependencies
testcase.description: If there are circular dependencies in the references to variables in a variable set.

variation.name: FactVar to GenVar to GenVar to FactVar dependency cycle
variation.description: A variable set where there are circular dependencies in the references to variables. In this case the fact variable has a identifer filter dependent on the identifier value in general variable $v:g2, which is produced from general variable $v:g1, which is derived (cyclically on purpose here) from the identifier of the same fact variable.
